name: EE&MC-European Economic & Marketing Consultants GmbH
goal: EE&MC-European Economic & Marketing Consultants is an economic consulting firm specialised in the application of sophisticated economic analyses in EU and national competition law proceedings. EE&MC provides economic analyses and expert testimonies in all competition matters.
euInitiatives: Developments in EU competition law; European School of Thought; economic analysis in EU competition law; cartels; vertical agreements; digital economy;
